title: NASCAR s Ryan Newman Says He ll Definitely Get Back in the Car After Catastrophic Daytona Crash
description: Ryan Newman isnt going to let that terrifying crash at the Daytona   stop him from racing  The NASCAR driver sat down with Today co hosts Savannah Guthrie  Hoda Kotb and Craig Melvin on Wednesday for his first interview since the Feb    crash  and assured
